description: TEHRAN – Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is not only a war criminal and a great cheater, but also a master of distorting the facts. Whenever he speaks about peace, he seeks total surrender. He also calls his cruelty against Palestinians a defense against “terrorism”.
title: Netanyahu is both war criminal and falsifier

description: TEHRAN – Esteghlal football team beat 2-0 on Saturday to secure their place in the final of the 2024/25 Iran Hazfi Cup.
title: Esteghlal defeat Sanat Naft to advance to 2024/25 Hazfi Cup final

description: TEHRAN - In a note, the Hamshahri newspaper addressed the holding of the fifth round of negotiations in Rome and the challenging and ambiguous conditions.
title: Americans seeking a confusing approach in negotiation

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi has firmly dismissed the so-called “two-state solution” as a viable path to peace in Palestine, arguing that the decades-old proposal has done little more than exacerbate the suffering of the Palestinian people.
title: Two-state solution is ‘unachievable promise’ for Gaza, FM says in Vatican

description: ISLAMABAD – The mujahid scholar, servant of Imam Reza (peace be upon him), and devoted servant of the Islamic Ummah—Ayatollah Seyyed Ebrahim Raisi—passed away in a manner akin to martyrdom.
title: Martyr Raisi’s final, historic visit to Pakistan despite strong U.S. opposition

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s ambassador to Turkey, Mohammad-Hassan Habibzadeh, reiterated Tehran’s commitment to regional stability, emphasizing that Iran supports any initiative aimed at eliminating terrorism and enhancing security among neighboring countries.
title: Iran endorses any efforts aimed at eliminating terrorism in the region, says envoy to Turkey

description: TEHRAN —Iran’s Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) declared on Saturday that it remains at peak readiness and will deliver a powerful and “regret-inducing” response to any act of aggression, stressing that its deterrent capability exceeds what enemies could anticipate.
title: IRGC vows crushing response to any hostile act, citing readiness ‘beyond imagination’

description: TEHRAN – Amid the ongoing tensions surrounding Iran’s nuclear program, one crucial fact often gets buried beneath heated political arguments: Iran, as a member of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT), holds an explicit legal right to enrich uranium for peaceful purposes.
title: Iran’s right to enrich uranium: A legal reality made political by US

description: TEHRAN — The inaugural international congress dedicated to the governance model of Martyr Ebrahim Raisi, Iran’s eighth president, took place this morning at the IRIB International Conference Center in Tehran.
title: First intl. congress on governance model of Martyr Raisi held in Tehran

description: TEHRAN – Iranians call the eight-year war against Saddam Hussein’s Iraq the Sacred Defense. For them, it was a time of immense hardship but also great pride. Thousands lost their lives fighting against Saddam’s forces, which were far better equipped and backed by major military powers, including the United States, the UK, and Germany.
title: Army Aviation still stands guard 43 years after Khorramshahr’s liberation, cmdr. tells Tehran Times

description: TEHRAN – The play “Noises Off” written by Michael Frayn and directed by Arash Bagheri and produced by Shayan Asadian will be staged at the Hilaj Theater in Tehran on May 28.
title: Hilaj Theater to host Michael Frayn’s “Noises Off”

description: TEHRAN – The Tehran Symphony Orchestra, under the baton of Maestro Nasir Heidarian, showcased the "Falak-ol-Aflak" Symphony at the centuries-old Falak-ol-Aflak Fortress in Khorramabad on Thursday night, captivating an audience of nearly 2,000 attendees in the western province of Lorestan.
title: Tehran Symphony Orchestra performs at Falak-ol-Aflak Fortress

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian author, translator, and scholar of Persian literature Hassan Kamshad passed away on Thursday at the age 100.
title: Iranian author, translator Hassan Kamshad passes away at 100

description: Amjad Shawa, head of the Palestinian NGO Network, says there has been “no major change” in the situation in Gaza after limited aid entered the enclave over the past days.
title: ‘Displacement, starvation, thirst’ plague Palestinians across Gaza

description: The testimony of Palestinian victims and Israeli soldiers in a news report by The Associated Press documents “the heinous crimes committed by Israel”, a statement by the group says.
title: Hamas says AP report on human shields shows Israel’s ‘moral collapse’

description: A federal judge on Friday blocked the Trump administration from cutting off Harvard’s enrollment of foreign students, an action the Ivy League school decried as unconstitutional retaliation for defying the White House’s political demands, AP reported.
title: Federal judge blocks Trump admin from barring foreign student enrollment at Harvard

description: Israeli settlers damaged water pipes supplying Palestinian families in the al-Auja waterfall area, located north of Jericho in the occupied West Bank, according to a local rights organisation.
title: Israeli settlers attack water supply of West Bank communities

description: TEHRAN – The United Nations has led urgent global condemnation against the Israeli regime over the escalating hunger crisis in Gaza.
title: Extermination through planned starvation

description: South Lebanon — Although President of the Palestinian Authority Mahmoud Abbas’s visit to Lebanon does not merit analysis or serious consideration,  the treatment he received from Lebanon’s anti-Resistance camp was highly ridiculous.
title: Mahmoud Abbas’ Beirut visit: Zero results for the Palestinian cause

description: Authorities in Peru have opened a criminal investigation against an Israeli soldier accused of committing war crimes in the Gaza Strip during 2023–2024, according to the Hind Rajab Foundation (HRF).
title: Peru opens criminal probe into Israeli soldier accused of 'methodical destruction' in Gaza

description: U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth on Friday issued orders that require journalists to have official escorts within much of the Pentagon building, the latest in a series of Trump administration restrictions placed on the press.
title: Pentagon puts new limits on reporters

description: TEHRAN – As the Gaza war reaches its most horrific crescendo, the last-minute diplomatic machinations and rhetorical condemnations of the European Union are being hailed in some quarters as a “watershed moment” in its relationship with Israel.
title: From indifference to moral posturing: Europe’s betrayal of Gaza’s civilians

description: TEHRAN — Siraf, a historic port located in Iran’s southern Bushehr province along the Persian Gulf, holds a deep and often overlooked connection to global storytelling.
title: Lost history of ‘Sindbad and Sheila’ in ancient Siraf port

description: TEHRAN - Deputy Minister of Cultural Heritage Ali Darabi announced that preparing a comprehensive dossier on the Great Wall of Gorgan is underway, aiming for its potential inscription on the UNESCO World Heritage list.
title: Global registration of Gorgan Great Wall on Cultural Heritage Ministry’s agenda

description: TEHRAN – A rare Parthian-era wall painting, being kept at the National Museum of Iran, reveals sophisticated artistry and enduring secrets.
title: Parthian mural excavated from southwest Iran reveals artistic innovation

description: TEHRAN - On the 43rd anniversary of the liberation of Khorramshahr, Iranian authorities unveiled official national registration documents for 12 sites and elements in Khuzestan province linked to the country’s eight-year war with Iraq, known domestically as the Sacred Defense (1980–1988).
title: Registration documents for ‘Sacred Defense’ elements unveiled

description: KERMAN - On May 21, the first-ever national celebration of ecolodges brought together some 600 ecolodge managers, travel insiders, and media personnel from across the country.
title: Reviving roots: a new chapter in Iran’s rural tourism
General Khamoushi in interview with Tehran Times

description: TEHRAN – Iranian freestyle wrestler Hassan Yazdani will not participate in the 2025 World Wrestling Championships.
title: Yazdani to miss 2025 World Wrestling Championships

description: Rudsar in northern Gilan Province is the main producer of borage - a medicinal herb used in traditional and modern medicine for various conditions, including skin disorders and arthritis.
title: Borage harvest in northern Iran

description: TEHRAN- As announced by the director-general of Hamedan province’s Customs Department, the value of non-oil export from the province increased by 10.3 percent in the past Iranian calendar year 1403 (ended on March 20), as compared to the preceding year.
title: Non-oil export from Hamedan province up 10% in a year

description: TEHRAN- Iran exported non-oil commodities valued at $140 million to Oman in the first Iranian calendar month of Farvardin (March 21-April 21), according to data from the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA).
title: Iran exports non-oil goods worth $140m to Oman in a month

description:
TEHRAN – Production of sponge iron in Iran rose seven percent in the first month of the current Iranian calendar year, Farvardin (March 21-April21), as compared to the first month in the previous year, 
As reported, 4.075 million tons of sponge iron was produced in Farvardin of this year, while the figure was 3.807 million tons in the same month of the past year.
title: Sponge iron production rises 7% in a month on year

description: TEHRAN- Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian referred to the government's strategy for expanding renewable energies, and stated that the movement in this direction has begun and is being followed continuously and regularly in daily and weekly government meetings.
title: ‘Government’s strategy for renewable energies development continuously followed up’

description: BEIJING- Prime Minister Li Qiang has stressed that as major developing countries and leading voices of the Global South, China and Indonesia should champion the Bandung Spirit.
title: China PM in Indonesia: Li Qiang emphasizes importance of Bandung Spirit, true multilateralism

description: TEHRAN- During an online ceremony at the place of Iran’s Ministry of Transport and Urban Development on Saturday, 4,219 projects in the fields of transportation, housing, and meteorology were inaugurated or launched in the presence of President Masoud Pezeshkian and Transport and Urban Development Minister Farzaneh Sadegh.
title: President, transport minister inaugurate, launch over 4,000 projects in country

description: URUMQI –The Editor-in-Chief of the Tehran Times, Mohammad Sarfi, delivered a speech at the SCO Media Summit in China, where he condemned Western media’s dehumanization of Palestinians amid Israel’s devastating war in the besieged Gaza Strip. The event, themed 'Building a Better Home Together for a Prosperous Future,' drew over 300 delegates from 26 countries, including Press TV and Khabar Fori from Iran.
title: At SCO summit, Tehran Times chief condemns Western media’s complicity in Israeli crimes

description: TEHRAN – Filippo Grandi, the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR), has appreciated Iran’s efforts in providing services to refugees in different fields, such as health, education, and employment.
title: Iran’s services to refugees are commendable: UNHCR Commissioner

description: TEHRAN – President Masoud Pezeshkian has issued an order, obligating the Department of Environment (DOE) to develop a strategic plan to preserve endangered species in the country.
title: Strategic plan to be developed for preserving endangered species

description: TEHRAN –Muhammad Iqbal Choudhary, the coordinator general of the Ministerial Standing Committee on Scientific and Technological Cooperation (COMSTECH), has said Iran plays a critical role in artificial intelligence (AI), relying on indigenized technology.
title: Indigenized technology contributes to Iran’s key role in AI: COMSTECH official

description: TEHRAN – The head of the Department of Environment, Shina Ansari, has said cooperation is the only way forward, as without global cooperation, achieving sustainable development is impossible.
title: Without global cooperation, sustainable development is impossible: head of DOE

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), rose 26,268 points to 3.151 million on Saturday, which is the first day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX gains 26,000 points on Saturday

description: Qatar’s journey with free trade zones (FTZs) is emblematic of its broader vision to diversify its economy beyond hydrocarbons and establish itself as a global hub for logistics, innovation, and foreign investment. From their conceptual beginnings to their strategic expansions today, Qatar’s FTZs have evolved in response to both regional dynamics and global trade demands.
title: Qatar’s Free Trade Zones: Past, Present, Future

description: TEHRAN –The match between Iran and North Korea football teams in the third round of the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualification (AFC) will be held in Tehran.
title: Tehran to host Iran, N. Korea match in 2026 WC qualifier

description: TEHRAN – Malavan football team defeated Gol Gohar 1-0 on Friday to secure their place in the final of the 2024/25 Iran Hazfi Cup.
title: Malavan edge Gol Gohar in 2024/25 Iran’s Hazfi Cup semifinals

description: URUMQI, China — “When we rely on media frameworks hostile to our realities, we surrender our regional narrative to those who seek to fragment us,” declared Mr. Mohammad Sarfi, Editor-in-Chief of the Tehran Times, during his keynote speech at the 2025 Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) Media Cooperation Forum on Friday.
title: Tehran Times chief blasts Western media’s Gaza 'moral failure' at SCO forum in China
